RCU bus driver

The RCU bus driver is a container for several sub-drivers:. More...
  • the Message Buffer Driver provides access to a memory mapped interface used for communication between the DCS board and the RCU.
  • the Selectmap driver provides access to the Selectmap(TM) interface of the Xilinx FPGA

More specifications will follow.

Generated on 12 Nov 2013 for RCU linux tools and drivers for the DCS board by  1.4.7
